== Iranian Team Members / اعضای تیم ایرانی اوبونتو ==

This page contains the current list of members of the IranianTeam.

=== New Members ===
If you are an Iranian Ubuntu User and would like to join the IranianTeam, feel free to add yourself to the list of members below and our <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/ubuntu-ir|launchpad team page]]</nowiki>.

=== Members List ===
Please add your Name, Province/City and also specify your IRC nick and language of choice.
